alert.note: Alert for Bryce Canyon Country; Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell; South Central Utah; Western Canyonlands (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 21 at 2:44PM MST until February 22 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * WHERE...Bryce Canyon Country, South Central Utah, Western Canyonlands and Glen Canyon Recreation Area/Lake Powell. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult due to crosswinds, especially for high profile vehicles and vehicles with trailers. Rough conditions are expected on area lakes including Lake Powell.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Bryce Canyon Country; Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell; South Central Utah; Western Canyonlands
